name: The Armclaw Experiment
description:
Use your arm hooks to swing around a procedurally generated city in VR!

Specifically designed for VR, The Armclaw Experiment aims to let you live the fantasy of swinging around in a large urban jungle.Gameplay
The Armclaw Experiment is a sandbox game. There are no missions or objectives, penalties or rewards, and there are no hand-holding tutorials. You can use your hooks to swing around and explore the city, hunt and grab the randomly placed stars in the map or have fun grabbing onto and wrecking helicopters. What you do is up to you.

Hope you have fun!
